title: WebDice
description: An app to throw 3D-simulated dice, change the number and color of dice, with motion controls for dice throwing in the mobile version

title: HomePrint
description: An app to allow devices in a local network to print PDF files without installing a printer

title: Jutsu
description: A platform to publish online portfolios by uploading images and details for each portfolio piece

title: tast-E
description: An application for creating recipes, rating and commenting on them

title: AstroWar
description: Created a web-browser video game where the player controls a spaceship battling other spaceships
